metadata.title: CVE-2024-50289 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: av7110: fix a spectre vulnerabilityAs warned by smatch:	drivers/staging/media/av7110/av7110_ca.c:270 dvb_ca_ioctl() warn:potential spectre issue 'av7110->ci_slot' [w] (local cap)There is a spectre-related vulnerability at the code. Fix it.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
